/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a sense of motion and life. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a vibrant backdrop to the urban landscape below. Buildings of various sizes and designs line the street, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. In the distance, a large white building with a curved roof stands out, adding a unique architectural element to the scene. The street itself is lined with trees, their green foliage contrasting with the concrete structures and adding a touch of nature to the urban setting. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and gives a sense of scale to the scene.
